text: 15.14 Development is expected to help reduce wealth and social inequality and support local enterprise, employment, education, and skills development and the councilâ€™s social value aims. This is to support residents to take advantage of the opportunities created by development, both during the construction and end user phase. 15.15 Planning obligations will be used to ensure developments contribute to this aim, including by making financial contributions which will be used by the council to fund training and support for residents and local businesses to access employment and enterprise opportunities resulting from development. The approach to calculating these contributions is set out in Appendix 2. In addition, developments BACK TO POLICIES
